Text: This is the 3rd ASAP file ive downloaded that doesnt play on an external media player!!!! spartacus s01 e03 was the same and shameless US s01 e03. plays ok with wmp but not using an external player. cvan anyone help? all copies of this episode seem to be copied from the same ASAP source so none of them work. have always used your torrents eztv with no trouble but these last few with ASAP in the title have been a problem. Has anyone got a copy of this episode not done by ASAP?? thanx

@gauge1971
Had problems with sound using convertxtodvd. Used winavi to convert the original file to .avi again and it worked fine after that.
